website_summaries.verdict: Formula yields a mild peanut taste without requiring any artificial colors, sweeteners, or flavors.
pros: Has 25 essential vitamins and minerals, helping you receive plenty of balance in your diet along with the extra protein boost
Consistency of the powder and the flavor make it a great choice for protein shakes or for use in recipes
cons: Some people may want a more distinctive flavor in their peanut butter powder

customer_reviews.title: and powdered pb is the best way to get my fix without all the extra ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a peanut butter addict, and powdered pb is the best way to get my fix without all the extra calories. It's great mixed into yogurt, smoothies, peanut stir frys, or even just mixed with milk and used as a dip. This is one of the better powdered peanut butters I've come across because it doesn't have any additives (ie sugar, salt etc). It's just pure peanuts. If you feel like adding sweetener,salt, or cinnamon you can do it yourself so it's more versatile. Hoosier farms is the cheapest per oz I've been able to find, so this is my 5th order of the stuff. Soooo good.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Best I've found with no added ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: The best, with absolutely no hidden ingredients. Two tablespoons is 1 Weight Watcher point. My favorite thing to do with it is to mix it with a good quality cocoa powder (also very low WW points), cashew milk, vanilla powder, a little sea salt, a little xylitol, splenda, and if its not nighttime, strong coffee. Blend it all into a chocolate icing/mousse, pudding - add nonfat cool whip for super luxury. The peanut powder stretches it without guilt.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Yates

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this substitute for regular peanut butter, as I am on the"Non-calorie Diet". I eat it on apple slices mostly, it makes for an acceptable snack on this diet. It is only a quarter of the amount of calories as regular peanut butter. The only thing I didn't understand were the instructions on the jar on making the one serving. It states to use equal parts water to powder. I found that to be way off, but I have been making 6 cups at a time, adjusting the measurements until I get to where I want it. I add the sea salt, and I have delicious peanut butter......DELICIOUS!!!!!!! Will continue to purchase this item..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't contain salt or sugar
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a number of different powdered peanut butters and I find that I like Hoosier Hill and Naked PB the best. They are the only ones that I've found that don't contain salt and cane sugar or some other sweetener - just peanuts. All powdered peanut butters have a strange smooth texture because they don't contain the oil but I spread it on a bagel with sugar free jam and if you can past the different texture, the taste is great.
customer_reviews.author: Bassetboyz

customer_reviews.title: Essentially Peanut Butter Protein Powder, and it's DELISH
customer_reviews.text: I've been using peanut flour the same way I would use protein powder - in "healthier dessert"-type recipes, mixed into yogurt, sauces, etc. I wouldn't say this is a substitute for real peanut butter, as (mixed with water) it gives you a totally different texture. But, depending on the recipe, I've found that a blend of 50/50 real peanut butter/peanut flour works really well to maintain that creamy texture but reduce the fat & amp up the protein. This is a great value compared to other brands - my only qualm is that the container is super bulky and takes up a lot of space in my cabinet. It'd be great if it came in a resealable bag.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Add depth to chile
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as part of an attempt to increase the fiber in my diet. The fiber recommendations are all grams of fiber per calories. While this doesn't have more fiber, it does have little of the oil / fat in regular peanut butter, and therefore fewer calories. I usually mix in a tablespoon or two with oatmeal, a shake, etc. It makes a nice addition to chile! You can also mix it with water to whatever consistency you like and use it like regular peanut butter. If _really_ want peanut butter flavor, sweeten it a little bit with molasses.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Great product, excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this peanut butter powder! I use it to make microwave mug cakes, other healthy baked goods, and as and as a tasty addition to protein shakes and/or smoothies. I like that it has no added sugar and doesn't come in a tiny little 5 oz container like some other brands. I do add a pinch of Himalayan pink salt to further enhance the taste.
customer_reviews.author: mountainespresso

customer_reviews.title: great for making smoothies
customer_reviews.text: This powdered peanut butter is great for making a smoothie, as it adds real peanut flavor and thickens the smoothie some, as well. I've found it mixes well with whatever non-dairy milk I'm using, too, but it stirs in best if the liquid is added just a little at a time. If it's added to half a glass of fluid or more, it'll have lumps. Tasty lumps, but still lumps.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve Neff

customer_reviews.title: Really great peanut butter powder that doesn't contain sugar.
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased multiple containers of this stuff and keep coming back to replace it. We've been really happy with all the Hoosier Hill Farms products we've purchased over the years, but this is one I get a lot of because it doesn't contain sugar. It works quite well for making peanut flavored items (peanut sauce for chicken satay), especially if you like to use it alongside peanut butter, but don't want quite that much fat.
customer_reviews.author: callaway7259

customer_reviews.title: Low-fat peanut butter alternative!
customer_reviews.text: Want the peanut butter flavor without most of the fat? Here's your answer. It does taste like peanut butter would if there was no fat. It dissolves well, but I don't follow the instructions on the container. Instead, I start with 2 tbsp powder and 1 tbsp cold water, then just add water until I get the right consistency. Spreads easy, but it doesn't bake like peanut butter (in hindsight, why would it?).
customer_reviews.author: Syxx

customer_reviews.title: Nice boost to all things peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: Nice boost to all things peanut butter. We love this stuff! Thanks, Hoosier Hills! Another winner. Use it in anything I make with peanut butter. Try peanut butter pancakes or waffles. Yum! Great boost to peanut butter cookies. Once again, an endless list. Just tried this in a smoothie the other day. Oh wow! Delicious! Love, love, love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Granny Annie

customer_reviews.title: Organic and just peanuts not fillers!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Awesome in shakes for a little extra protein or just plain. I know some people have said they add vanilla, salt, or sugar to their powdered peanut butter, but I like it plain or maybe with a little coffee added. I like it that way, don't think my preference will suit everyone. But, it's really hard to find a powered peanut butter without added ingredients. This is just peanuts!
customer_reviews.author: kebells

customer_reviews.title: Tasteless
customer_reviews.text: I can buy Walmart's powdered peanut butter of about 1/2 the cost and the flavor is 100% better - this is NOT worth the extra money spent and I really thought it would be...totally dissatisfied
customer_reviews.author: Starla

customer_reviews.title: I love this because it tastes good and it's low in ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this because it tastes good and it's low in calories. Love the convenience of making fresh peanut butter without all the fat. Love the price also compared to others. I love mixing this with tahini, stevia sweetener and a pinch of himalayan salt. I hated the taste when I only mixed it with water. Though it's a great lower calorie substitution to help with cravings.
customer_reviews.author: Serpsb

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is GOLD! GOLD, I tell ya! GOOLLLD!!!
customer_reviews.text: I mix a few scoops of this with my protein shake every day and it makes the best tasting protein I have ever had! Seriously. I should probably slow down on it because there is a bit of fat and carbs in it that I don't need but mixed with my gold standard protein powder it's essentially a meal in a glass. Amazing stuff. I haven't even tried using it to make peanut butter yet but the flavor is delicious so I'm sure it would be excellent peanut butter if I used it as it was intended. Either way...I recommend the heck out of this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Peanut Powder, No Sugar
customer_reviews.text: This product is a peanut powder, removal of water and fats of peanuts. I was looking for something that did not have added sugar to it. This would be perfect for people that have sugar/carbohydrate limitations in their diets.
customer_reviews.author: ayTop Contributor: Fishing

customer_reviews.title: I add this to my shakes in the morning and OMG is it amazing! And the only ingredient is peanuts
customer_reviews.text: Delicious!!!!!! I add this to my shakes in the morning and OMG is it amazing! And the only ingredient is peanuts, it can't get better than this. I don't actually use it as regular peanut butter (as in adding water to the powder to make a peanut butter mixture) so I can't attest to the tastiness of using it that way. But if you are combining it in something such as shakes, this is the product for you. Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah S.

customer_reviews.title: Very convienient to use
customer_reviews.text: Water is recommended to mix with this powder along with a little salt and sugar to taste. No vegetable oil, but you might want to use oil some in addition to the water to tame the very strong peanut odor! I only batch the amount of mix that I need at the time but you can batch extra and store the unused in the refrigerator, I assume, up to 3 days. I use a 1/4 cup of powder to make enough spread for 2 slices of toast.
customer_reviews.author: U-Awtah Know

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: I have never tried peanut butter powder before but was looking for a relatively low calorie add-in to my protein powder. It is delicious and very concentrated peanutty goodness. This jar is going to last a very long time!
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a few brands and this is a best. Not only is it more natural with no additives but it is also the best tasting. This powder blends thicker than the others. The density seems greater resulting in a jar lasting longer. I like mine mixed with cinnamon, cashew milk, and sugar free pancake syrup for sandwiches.
customer_reviews.author: NorthghostTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love that it's ONLY peanuts! If you need it to taste like manufactured pb, go ahead and add sugar and salt and oil and vanilla and....... but if you like the taste of peanuts, this is the one to use. Works great in smoothies & oatmeals without adding unnecessary sugar.
customer_reviews.author: 13107Mama

customer_reviews.title: No sugar Added
customer_reviews.text: It's a peanut butter powder, with no sugar. It's very bitter, but you can hide that very well in a smoothie since presumably, you're going to add fruit. I'd rather have a plain, bitter powder that I can control the sweetness of, so I know exactly how much sugar I'm adding to it. So if you're uptight like me, this is your powder.
customer_reviews.author: Deb H

customer_reviews.title: poorly sealed container
customer_reviews.text: Sadly the container was not sealed upon receipt, so I had to cancel / return via Amazon then reorder and frustrated as the UPS pickup service never happened and it sat at my front door for four days. Had to cancel that return then do it manually and drop off--that was annoying and waste of time. Just received the 2nd product today (yes this one was fully sealed). That is why I gave three stars as it is what I expected the first time. This is great product for smoothies!
customer_reviews.author: mcm

customer_reviews.title: great powdered peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: I think this stuff is great. I add it to oatmeal or protein shakes to add a nice peanut-butter flavor and a little extra protein, w/o a lot of extra fat or carbs. and no added sugar, which is ideal. have not tried to make "peanut butter" with it, so I won't vouch for that.
customer_reviews.author: Sab_Fan

customer_reviews.title: No additives - just want I wanted for baby
customer_reviews.text: It's peanut butter powder, fat reduced and just that. Bought it to mix into my baby's cereal for allergen introduction, as it's easier to get her sufficient protein exposure that way than with the added fat bulk in regular peanut butter every time.
customer_reviews.author: Ania

customer_reviews.title: YUMMY!  Try it!
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived as promised and packaged well. It's always a little risky trying a new product and manufacturer. I am very pleased with the taste and quality of this product. It just seems a little creamier and richer tasting than the big powdered peanut butter brand. The sale for me was that it is organic.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jones

customer_reviews.title: All peanuts, nothing else.
customer_reviews.text: 100 % Peanuts. Nothing else. Perfect for baking, smoothies, yogurt, sauces, eating mixed with a bit of water (or not). I have been using PBfit for some time, but my local store stopped stocking it. In my search for PBfit this product popped up and I decided to give it a try. I love that there is no salt or sugar added to this product (not the case with PBfit), giving me the option to add myself or not. My only suggestion is to be careful when opening the container... Mine was so full that my counter got a dusting of peanut powder. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice M

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like peanuts, not crap
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! I’ve purchased other “peanut butter” powders before without paying attention to the label. They didn’t taste like peanuts. They tasted artificial...and no wonder! They had other stuff besides peanuts in them. This peanut butter powder is made of ONLY PEANUTS! Perfect for the smoothies I make. That other stuff didn’t give me a peanutty flavor in my peanut butter banana smoothies, but this stuff does!
customer_reviews.author: jessturely

customer_reviews.title: There's a learning curve here....
customer_reviews.text: The 1/1 ratio isn't right, and if you just mix the powder and water it tastes pretty nasty. I found that by adding a little salt and sugar, you wind up with more of what I"m used to tasting. I haven't used this for baking yet, but I'm sure that it will be good without adding fat or unwanted moisture to your recipes you're adapting.
customer_reviews.author: SnafoooTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: The PERFECT Peanut Butter Powder!
customer_reviews.text: This is the PERFECT peanut butter powder. I like that it doesn't have any extra ingredients, just pure powdered peanuts. It has a great flavor and mixes well with my oatmeal (which I then sweeten with raw, unfiltered honey - highly recommended!). As an added benefit, it has a much better protein to fat ratio than normal peanut butter.
customer_reviews.author: fueledbymetal

customer_reviews.title: Ita okay
customer_reviews.text: I like peanut butter but it has a weird oily taste. I put it in my blender and mix with my protein powder, makes a good meal replacement. Will probably go back to pbfit after.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Lifesaver! I count macros and this has been awesome to add on top of oatmeal, into smoothies, as a dip for apples, etc. It has a great peanut butter flavor and the package is really large! Like that they fill it to the top.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Both Costco and Sam's stopped carrying the large size PB2, and I didn't want to pay grocery prices, so I ordered this product. What I Iike is no added sugar. What I don't like is not enough sugar; adding a bit of stevia to the mix ... but that's MY issue, not theirs :)
customer_reviews.author: Ayla

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good price
customer_reviews.text: I use peanut butter powder in the fruit and protein shakes that I make for my lunch most days. I've tried several kinds. This is a very good one, and more cost-effective than others I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: MarianTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good quality-a bit pricey
customer_reviews.text: This is good-quality peanut powder. It doesn't have any sugar or salt, so it may seem a bit bitter if you are used to the other brands. Just add a bit of sweetener to it if you like. The price seems high, but I guess demand for peanut powder is not that great.
customer_reviews.author: Kara K.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I go through this stuff pretty quickly. It's not sweet like PB2, which is fine because this has 0 sugar. If you want it sweet, mix it with a dab of maple syrup and let your tastebuds party.
customer_reviews.author: Keata

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this peanut butter powder. The protein content is very high, so I know I am getting a good protein punch when I add it to my breakfast smoothies. It blends well and tastes great. I have never made it into peanut butter but find it to be perfect in the smoothies. The price is good, quality is great and nutrition facts are just as I would like - not too much sugar, no sucralose and high protein.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Donner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flavor. Great value.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is excellent. I add it to my chocolate protein shakes. It dissolves very nicely, with only a few larger or peanut bits remaining. It is cheaper and better tasting than PB2, especially when you consider that you aren't paying for any added sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Perfect...and perfectly yummy in recipes
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? It's exactly what I wanted...a peanut flour without sugar for low carb/gluten free baking.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne

customer_reviews.title: Our Favorite PB Powder
customer_reviews.text: We've tried three or four different PB powder brands....and they've all been pretty good But, we like this one the best. Taste is obviously a very personal thing....but we just think this one tastes better.
customer_reviews.author: WMP

customer_reviews.title: Great Peanut Flavor
customer_reviews.text: Flavor is excellent, seems fresh and I trust this brand because I've used lots of their products.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Idk
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if it’s my body or this brand. I just feel it’s really acidy compared to the name brand I usually buy.
customer_reviews.author: gogohusky

customer_reviews.title: I think this might make a good flour or cornstarch substitute.
customer_reviews.text: Its got the same consistency as powdered peanut butter, but there's no peanut butter flavor to speak of. Since its flavorless this might make a great low carb alternative to flour. For recipes like cakes, brownies, pancakes and bread or a very low carb alternative to cornstarch for pudding, frosting and other deserts. if a recipe needs a type of flour or cornstarch try this instead.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Luna

customer_reviews.title: Tastes better than other sugary brands
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on reviews and it was great. Less sugar and more peanut taste.
customer_reviews.author: Foto

customer_reviews.title: Hoosier hills peanut butter powder has a really good peanut butter flavor that I have been happy with
customer_reviews.text: Received the powdered peanut butter very quickly as expected. I had not used this brand before. I have used it to make smoothies and added it to oatmeal - steel cut overnight and regular warmed up. Hoosier hills peanut butter powder has a really good peanut butter flavor that I have been happy with. I will definitely order from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Walt

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It's so good! And it will last you a couple of years! Love adding it to my oatmeal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for years now and felt it was time for a review. The quality is amazing, just a simple no-frills product that shocker has only 1 ingredient...peanuts. Blends well in my morning smoothie and adds a reasonable peanut butter taste without overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: F_Eleven

customer_reviews.title: If you want busted up package order
customer_reviews.text: 2nd time came in damaged and has a no return policy. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: pattyconklin

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Add a little Cacao powder
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Add a little Cacao powder, Sugar-free Vanilla protein powder, Sugar free Cashew Milk, Chia Seeds, 1 T Hemp Oil and a Banana - You have a very Nutritious Breakfast and you are Good till Lunch! And It tastes Sinfully Good!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great !
customer_reviews.text: This peanut powder is awesome! It tastes really good, I mix it with water or put it in my yogurt. The best part is it has no sugar or chemicals in it. I highly recommend Hoosier Hill Peanut Butter powder !
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui

customer_reviews.title: On keto diet and I love this PB Powder
customer_reviews.text: On keto diet and I love this PB Powder. I am a repeat customer. I mix it with coconut oil daily. For an added treat I mix in a tablespoon of heavy cream to the PB Powder/ Coconut Oil and chill in freezer for an evening treat. This Powder is only peanuts and no other ingredients. Have used it in baking as well with good results.
customer_reviews.author: Chesed Charis

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as competitors
customer_reviews.text: I'm just going to give a quick pro/con on this one. Pros Low carb No added sugar Cons Bitter after taste competitors don't have really needs sweetener to taste like peanut butter
customer_reviews.author: Mitch10

customer_reviews.title: awesome peanut butter powder
customer_reviews.text: I especially use it in baking. Great flavor ( I have to add some sweetener) and low carb. Great for Keto.
customer_reviews.author: Katiedyd69

customer_reviews.title: great product! I find I have to have put ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, great product! I find I have to have put extra tbsp. servings in to get a richer peanut butter taste but, I've really enjoyed this product so far! It's perfect in my shakes without adding a whole bunch of calories. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Sesame

customer_reviews.title: Yummy peanut butter without sugar
customer_reviews.text: Wow is this big! I use it in my shakes.
customer_reviews.author: readermom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Shakes
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic in shakes. Excellent macros - Much better than regular PB. If you want to completely recreate the taste, all that is needed is a 1:1 ratio of powder to water and about 1 teaspoon of Stevia per 2 Tablespoons of prepared PB. This stuff is far superior to the PB2 because of the lack of added sugar. Easily a 5-star product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but peanuts here!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! So many powdered peanut butters have added sodium, amount other things. This is great!! I love all of the products from Hoosier Hill Farm. I also like the containers. I reuse them for other things once they're empty.
customer_reviews.author: Myra

customer_reviews.title: I'm so glad I found this because it just has peanuts in ...
customer_reviews.text: It's so hard to find peanut butter powder in the store that does not have added sugar. I'm so glad I found this because it just has peanuts in it. This peanut butter is great and delicious. Works well in smoothies and I used it to introduce my children to peanuts when they started to eat solids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good no sugar, low carb peanut butter powder
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mix with water and stevia sweetner and can ber used in recipes.
customer_reviews.author: charmed

customer_reviews.title: This organic peanut powder is a fantastic bargain. I use it in smoothies
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the generic label fool you. This organic peanut powder is a fantastic bargain. I use it in smoothies, sprinkle it on salads and have made peanut butter with it following the directions on the label. Oh, and I love feeling like I am supporting an American farm family, to whom I say thanks for a delicious product at a fantastic price!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Tastes very good like peanuts not peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome for a low carb diet! I used it for my cheesecake crust with one packet of Stevia and it was amazing❤️ I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: tastes gross
customer_reviews.text: ok so i have tried many powderd peanut butter. most i like this taste. this stuff tasted like it had crushed up medicine in it. the nastiest taste. honestly Walmarts great value powdered pb is wayyyyy better
customer_reviews.author: Carly Gernstetter

customer_reviews.title: Find a better PB powder.
customer_reviews.text: Not as tasty as Great Value brand and 40% more expensive. I thought it might be MORE tasty. However it is sodium free, so that is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: LG Ripdmeov

customer_reviews.title: Perfect peanut powder?
customer_reviews.text: Post painstakingly pondering procurable peanut powder products; pleasantly purchased Premium Peanut Powder! Particularly pleased! Positively perfect pungent protein particles pulverized phenomenally!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Morphis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. Mixes with just a spoon.
customer_reviews.text: Great powder mixes well with just a spoon. Great blended in smoothies. It’s just peanut butter but without the added calories and fat. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jusburnin_dc5

customer_reviews.title: We use it mostly in smoothies but is also great to bake treats with
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the few peanut butter powders that does not have added sugar. It tastes delicious and is high quality. We use it mostly in smoothies but is also great to bake treats with, throw in a little in pancake batter, brownies, or cookies. So many options!
customer_reviews.author: Barbie Elsasser

customer_reviews.title: Could not ask for better. Adds Protein to All Reiopes I use
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and value for the price. I love that I add this to many recipes and my chocolate meal replacement drink which makes it taste like a Reeses candy bar. Dissolved great and delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Patti

customer_reviews.title: Pure flavor
customer_reviews.text: This is such a good product. The flavor is robust and pure. Third order tells it all. We use it in our smoothies every day - more protein, fewer calories. Thank you for an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Katsco

customer_reviews.title: This is excellent for exactly what I ordered it for and that ...
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent for exactly what I ordered it for and that was main PB and choc protein smoothies. It also mixes well with liquid of your choice for sandwiches!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to stir into my dog's food since she's an extremely picky eater. It's clearly very good quality and it's super easy to put a spoonful on her food and some water and mix it up.
customer_reviews.author: J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Better than most I have purchased in brick and mortar shops.
customer_reviews.text: I love the quantity and price and convenience of being delivered. It hydrated very easily and tastes good...especially mixed with honey!
customer_reviews.author: Tangled Yarn

customer_reviews.title: super product, used it in my Buckeyes candy
customer_reviews.text: super product, used it in my Buckeyes candy, added some dryness to the recipe without hindering the recipe, making it easier to shape. Love it, will for sure use it many times. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: S. Long

customer_reviews.title: PB Livin
customer_reviews.text: This peanut powder is good. I can't really tell a difference between it and other peanut butter powders but it works great in my oats for breakfast and for baking. I plan on buying more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S

customer_reviews.title: Best Value on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Best value I've found on Amazon for powdered peanut butter that's free of added sugar/salt. It's American-made too. Only suggestion would be a glass jar so it would be eco-friendly. Still love this though!
customer_reviews.author: Grace E. Bodey

customer_reviews.title: More roasted than peanut taste to me.
customer_reviews.text: Peanuts are a little overcooked for my taste. Will finish it but not reorder.
customer_reviews.author: MWR

customer_reviews.title: TASTES JUST LIKE POWDERED PEANUTS!
customer_reviews.text: This is terrific authentic tasting Peanut Butter powder that only has 35 cal. per 1 Tbsp. serving. Love adding it to my protein shakes like Zantrex.
customer_reviews.author: SAS

customer_reviews.title: delicious
customer_reviews.text: I use this powder almost everyday for a peanut butter banana smoothie and I love it! I love that it has zero sugar added unlike many of the brand names.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pure Peanuts!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered several different brands of peanut butter...so far this is the winner. Ingredients are just peanuts.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M.

customer_reviews.title: Great texture and taste
customer_reviews.text: Really like being able to find peanut powder without any added sugar. Compares well with similar products I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy way to imbibe PB - just need to come up with a powdered Jelly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use it daily in plain Greek yogurt with a little maple syrup. Delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Casual Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Just peanuts in powder!
customer_reviews.text: Love this powder in my breakfast smoothie with yogurt almond milk half banana and handful blueberries!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina K. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Who Knew powdered peanutbutter would be so fun.
customer_reviews.text: Loving the powdered Peanut butter. I have been adding it to my morning smoothies to change flavors. Favorites so far are Choc/Banana/Peanutbutter, Peanut Butter & Jelly ( I add frozen berries). Just think of a flavor and add a dash of Peanut Butter to it and its awesome.
customer_reviews.author: rick read

customer_reviews.title: This is the good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this product-will Be reordering! All of the peanut powders I have found in the grocery stores have sugar. This doesn’t and it tastes great. We use it almost daily in smoothies
customer_reviews.author: TinVA

customer_reviews.title: New fave
customer_reviews.text: NEVER going back to the sugar/salt infused PB powders again! This is now my go-to! Perfect for smoothies and chia pudding.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great taste. I like the fact there's no added sugars.
customer_reviews.author: mmefran

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable Value.  Peanut Flavor OK
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. Surprisingly doesn't add a whole lot of peanut flavor unless u add a lot which adds fat and calories.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: No added sugars like many of the other peanut butter powders and a ...
customer_reviews.text: Wouldnt mind if they made an organic version but this is my goto product right now. No added sugars like many of the other peanut butter powders and a reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: Jeff F

customer_reviews.title: Solid!
customer_reviews.text: Literally just powdered peanut butter. Nothing more, nothing less. Exactly what I wanted. Add some sea salt and use almond milk for some delicious tasting peanut butter. Add it to your smoothies, or just whip up a bowl of the stuff since its only 45 calories a serving. Not very sweet, as expected, nice smooth peanut taste for a solid price.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: No added sugar!
customer_reviews.text: I now buy this brand in bulk since I want a tasty protein for my smoothies but not the extra calories of fat or sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Fong

customer_reviews.title: Zero sugar
customer_reviews.text: Delicious and most importantly, no added sugar. Great texture, easy to mix, good flavor. I like making mine using almond milk.
customer_reviews.author: Jasper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: satisfies my peanut butter cravings-almost i put it on fruit in smoothies and i make puddings-luvin it!
customer_reviews.author: tellmelfel

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: I like this brand of peanut butter powder--NO sugar added!
customer_reviews.author: Joni J. Schultheis

customer_reviews.title: Taste just like peanuts
customer_reviews.text: It works and tasres really well on my morning smoothie, which is what I bought it for to replace the jar peanut butter I would add.
customer_reviews.author: rick

customer_reviews.title: Best Peanut Butter Power!
customer_reviews.text: Best peanut butter powder on the market!! There are no hidden ingredients, just plain roasted peanuts. It has great flavor since the nuts are roasted before they are smashed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Boston University Student

customer_reviews.title: This is great PB powder
customer_reviews.text: This is great PB powder. I was looking for something with just peanuts no sugar no salt. I previously bought PB and me peanut butter powder. I find that I have to use less of the Hoosier Hill Farm PB powder than the other brand. I will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: LN

customer_reviews.title: I use it in my shakes and have noticed that since I changed to this brand the shakes have a bitter taste and just not as good as
customer_reviews.text: Arrived timely. I use it in my shakes and have noticed that since I changed to this brand the shakes have a bitter taste and just not as good as my previous brand.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Great in smoothies
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my smoothies and while it is not Jif that is the point. there is not the same amount of sugar. Works great and last longer than a jar of peanut butter.
customer_reviews.author: Walt

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and taste with no added ingredients. Just what I was looking for - great price!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Winner
customer_reviews.text: I've tried quite a few different brands of powdered peanut butter! This one is the best by far. It has a great peanut taste and the price was better than most others! Earned every star!
customer_reviews.author: D.W.

product_meta.title: Peanut Butter Powder, 2 Lbs, Gluten Free, Non-GMO, Made in USA
product_meta.description: Peanut butter powder is made from real peanuts and converted to a free flowing powdered product that yields a pure peanut flour. The use of this product will provide a unique peanut flavor in a variety of products including baking mixes, toppings, coatings, nut flavorings, health foods, and dry mixes.
feature_bullets: 2 Full Pounds of Peanut Butter Powder, GMO Free, No Artificial Colors, No Artificial Flavors, No Artificial Sweeteners, No Whey Protein, No Soy Protein
Vegan, Contains 25 essential Vitamins and Minerals, High Fiber, High Protein, Zero Cholesterol
Great source of Potassium, Contains 100mg of plant derived Omega 3's, Essential Enzymes for Optimal Digestion
Peanut butter powder is made from real peanuts and converted to a free flowing powdered product that yields a pure peanut flour.
Hoosier Hill Farm is located in America's heartland of northeast Indiana; Our products and ingredients are guaranteed fresh and we are proud of our heritage and good, old-fashioned values
